column1:
html, body {
          position: relative;
          height: 100%;
        }
        body {
          background: #eee;
          font-family: Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;
          font-size: 14px;
          color:#000;
          margin: 0;
          padding: 0;
        }
        .swiper-container {
          width: 100%;
          height: 100%;
        }
        .swiper-slide {
          text-align: center;
          font-size: 18px;
          background: #fff;
          /* Center slide text vertically */
          display: -webkit-box;
          display: -ms-flexbox;
          display: -webkit-flex;
          display: flex;
          -webkit-box-pack: center;
          -ms-flex-pack: center;
          -webkit-justify-content: center;
          justify-content: center;
          -webkit-box-align: center;
          -ms-flex-align: center;
          -webkit-align-items: center;
          align-items: center;
        }
